history.content:
My opinion is that I would never do 5 techs in one semester. But data 8 and 100 and cs61c typically admit everyone. I would super avoid math 53 with Sethian because in previous semesters he taught the class the average was about a C, which is breathtakingly mean.

So definitely definitely phase 1 whoever the other person teaching 53 is (since probably everyone will want to be in that lecture), and cs188 since it is reasonably popular cs upper div, and I guess also data 100. 

--------------------------------------

This is honestly a crazy schedule, if you choose to go forward with all the above classes.

For phase I, like the above person said, suitable 53, 188 and 100 (ensure you have met the prereqs though).

My opinion is that I would never do 5 techs in one semester. But data 8 and 100 and cs61c typically admit everyone. I would super avoid math 53 with Sethian because in previous semesters he taught the class the average was about a C, which is breathtakingly mean.

So definitely definitely phase 1 whoever the other person teaching 53 is (since probably everyone will want to be in that lecture), and cs188 since it is reasonably popular cs upper div, and I guess also data 100.

My opinion is that I would never do 5 techs in one semester. But data 8 and 100 and cs61c typically admit everyone. I would super avoid math 53 with Sethian because in previous semesters he taught the class the average was about a C, which is breathtakingly mean.

So definitely definitely phase 1 whoever the other person teaching 53 is, and cs188 since it is reasonably popular cs upper div, and I guess also data 100.

I am currently an intended CS major, I am finishing up my last major prereqs this semester so I'll find out over the summer if I'll be doing CS as my major. However, if CS doesn't go planned then I was thinking of majoring in Applied Math and Data Science and minoring in CS. Which classes should I phase 1 in this case? I only need Math 53 to declare as an Applied Maths major and I need to retake CS8 since I P/Np'ed it. I was thinking of doing the Data Science Math Cluster, hence wanted to take Data 100 and CS 188, these two classes also satisfy two upper divs for Data Science that I can overlap with both majors.

history.subject: Which classes should I PHASE 1?
